thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: Joe
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Joe

author: Joe
title: Joe
text:
I genuinely am unable to fault Life Style Sports and the service they offer.
Prices are always competitive and their delivery service is flawless.
The whole ordering process is seamless...I literally can submit an order on my phone, and have it delivered to my work 2 days later.
Thanks Life Style Sports!
Edit:
Just realized that this is my 2nd such review, but that in itself says a lot, I am a returning customer, so continued recognition is due for a continued quality service.
